author: Staff Reporter
text:
The sessions court here on Friday sentenced three persons to life for a murder committed two decades ago.

According to the prosecution, the accused Basappa (31) had plotted to murder Chandrappa, who allegedly was having an affair with his wife. On the day of the murder in 1995, Basappa intercepted Chandrappa along with his relatives and hacked him to death.

Delivering the verdict, the sessions court sentenced Basappa, his relatives Nagaraj and Venkatasamy to life term.
title: Three persons get life term
